moods.label: Low
moods.message: It's okay to have off days. Take it slow today.

moods.label: Sad
moods.message: Feeling sad is part of being human. Reach out to us today, we might be able to help.

moods.label: Okay
moods.message: You're doing alright. Keep moving forward!

moods.label: Good
moods.message: Glad to hear you're doing well today!

moods.label: Great
moods.message: Fantastic! Spread your positivity to others.
